text: Iterative HFold is a robust method for prediction of pseudoknotted RNA secondary structures , whose accuracy with more than 5 % information about true pseudoknot - free structures is better than that of IPknot , and with about 35 % information about true pseudoknot - free structures compares well with that of HotKnots V2 . 0 while being significantly faster . Iterative HFold and all data used in this work are freely available at computational methods for prediction of RNA structure are valuable .
